page.title: 19INTERVIEW _MANOR OWNER cont
page.content: The garden contains vegetables & soft fruit,& the owners breed pigs, chickens, cows, ducks & turkeys. They cultivate Christmas trees and willow for cricket bats. There is sufficient stabling for six horses but there is only one hunter at present. Peach & nectarine trees grow in a walled garden. There is a full-time & a part-time gardener and a housekeeper. Mr.Grant-Williams re-designed the Tudor rose garden. He enjoys reading, writing and listening to classical music. He has two dogs, one cat and a pair of peacocks.
